name: japanese-learning-tools
description: A collection of Claude Code plugins for Japanese language learning, including dictionary lookup, vocabulary extraction, grammar analysis, and more.

plugins.name: macos-dictionary-plugin
plugins.description: macOS Dictionary integration for Japanese learning (macOS only) - lookup readings, parts of speech, and definitions from built-in Japanese dictionaries

plugins.name: doc-structure-plugin
plugins.description: Documentation structure management - standardize README formats and file header comments using hierarchical aggregation pattern
